events.message: The insured reported a car collision that occurred on April 30, 2024, involving their vehicle and another party at a traffic intersection.
After initial review, the claim was categorised under Auto Accident due to keywords identifying the incident involving a vehicle collision.
An experienced claims agent specializing in auto accidents was assigned to the case to expedite processing and customer service.
The claimant received formal acknowledgment of their auto accident claim submission along with preliminary next steps.
The claims department requested photographs of the damaged vehicle, police accident report, and insurance policy number for verification.
The claimant provided all requested documents including detailed photos of the damaged car and official accident report.
The investigation team began assessing the circumstances of the vehicle collision to determine liability and claim validity.
All investigation procedures were completed, confirming the insured was not at fault while validating the claim details.
Based on investigation findings, a settlement offer was proposed to cover repair costs and any associated damages.
The insured responded positively to the settlement proposal, appreciating the prompt and fair handling of the claim.
Following customer acceptance, the claim was officially approved to proceed with the payment and repairs.
The payment for car repair and related expenses was issued to the claimantâ€™s account without delay.
The auto accident claim case was officially closed after all procedures were completed and the claimant confirmed satisfaction.
All records and documents related to this auto accident claim were securely archived for future reference and compliance.
